thread.title: Friday Harbor Salmon Classic on San Juan Island is Dec. 3-5
thread.title_full: Friday Harbor Salmon Classic on San Juan Island is Dec. 3-5 | The Seattle Times

author: Mark Yuasa
title: Friday Harbor Salmon Classic on San Juan Island is Dec. 3-5
text:
The Friday Harbor Salmon Classic is Dec. 3-5 at Friday Harbor on San Juan Island.
This new derby replaces the Resurrection Salmon Derby, which has moved to Anacortes after being held in Friday Harbor for the past five years.
Only 100 team tickets will be sold for $425 each. Included is free moorage and an awards banquet at Friday Harbor Brickworks.
There will be $17,500 in prize money up for grabs, and the classic is part of the Northwest Salmon Derby Series. All participants are eligible for the grand prize boat drawing that will be awarded in mid-September, 2016 at the Everett Coho Derby.

Tickets can be purchased online at www.fridayharborsalmonclassic.com or the Friday Harbor Ace Hardware and Bellingham’s Lake Union Sea Ray.
 
Mark Yuasa : 206-464-8780 or myuasa@seattletimes.com ; on Twitter: @markkyuasa . Mark Yuasa covers fishing and outdoors in the Pacific Northwest.
